name: Mayday
overview: A well-made clone of Taito's Lunar Rescue made for the BBC Micro by James Hughes and published by Bevan Technology in 1984. Keyboard control only. In Mayday you have to land your little craft on either the small platform (100 points) or the big platform (50 points) while avoiding the aliens in the middle. Once you've landed your craft you have to fly back to the mothership, but now the aliens will shoot at you. However, you can also shoot at the aliens.
